name: Wandering Cat (itch)
description:
Warning: this game contains references to animal harm/death via dialogue. No visual depictions of harmful acts occur. Controls

Press enter or click "Begin" to start.
Uses W, A, S, D to move left/right and jump.
Right-click on the "Continue" button to advance dialogue.
Press P or ESC to pause the game (the menu can be a little finnicky, it helps to be gentle).

Game Description

It's Halloween, and black cats shouldn't be outside in the middle of the night. There's still time to wander and say hello to friends before you need to be home, though.

Originally inspired by the cautionary posts that go around on social media each year urging black cat owners to keep their furry friends safe indoors, you play as a black cat with a (somewhat) careful owner. The privilege to be outdoors past nightfall was lost following an attack on a friend, but you can deal with that.

Team

Programmer, Producer, Writer | Robin Klinger
Artist, Designer | Huimin Huang
Programmer | Tyler Tumanda
